description.name: arbarbitrum
description.tagline: Arbitrum arbitrum Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto arbitrum-arb Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Arbitrum arbitrum directly on your website
Unique arbitrum/arb receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your arbitrum/arb wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
